mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id, name, path, component, permission, type, icon, sort, created_at, updated_at FROM menu ORDER BY sort ASC, id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (parent_id, name, path, component, permission, type, icon, sort) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{name}, #{path}, #{component}, #{permission}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{sort})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.path, m.component, m.permission, m.type, m.icon, m.sort, m.created_at, m.updated_at FROM menu m INNER JOIN role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.sort ASC, m.id ASC
